source: "'Mrs Dursley had had a nice, normal day. "'She told him over dinner all about Mrs Nextdoor's problems with her daughter "'and how Dudley had learnt a new word. "'Shamt!'
target: Mrs Dursley had had a nice, normal day. She told him over dinner all about Mrs Nextdoor's problems with her daughter and how Dudley had learnt a new word. Shamt!
